name: dizziness
content:
dizziness noun [U]
(FEELING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a temporary feeling that your sense of balance is not good and that you may fall down: The sight of blood may cause dizziness in some people.

dizziness noun [U]
(QUALITY)
the quality of being confusing and very fast: The dizziness of the camerawork gives the scene a confusing quality.
